questionnaire.name: Activity: Developing a partner value proposition
questionnaire.intro:
Before you reach out to potential partners, it is important to have a strong value proposition. A value proposition is a concise statement that paints a clear picture of what you program will offer potential partners. This template is just a starting point. Once you have developed a statement using this template, you may be able to edit and refine it to make it even more compelling and concise.

Example: Our innovative 12-week pre-apprenticeship will provide you access to pre-screened, well-trained women with trade-specific skills and OSHA certification that will help diversity your talent pipeline.

Click "Answer the questions..." below to draft your own partner value proposition.

survey.name: Activity: Developing a partner value proposition
survey.title: Activity: Developing a partner value proposition
survey.thank_body:
Thank you for submitting your partner value proposition.

Remember, this template is just a starting point. You are encouraged to continue to refine your value proposition and adapt it to different audiences and contexts.

Click "Continue" to proceed to the next activity.

question.content:
Our ______________________ [program description]

Will provide you access to pre-screened, well-trained ________ [segment of adult participants]

With ____________________ [skills and certifications]

That will ________________ [key benefit(s) to employer / apprenticeship].


(Required)
